name: The Old House [Demo]
description:
The Old House is a PSX inspired adventure game.

Mulberry is asked to investigate a strange occurrence at his childhood home. 

This game is a work from Magpie Collective and featured contributions from:

MulberryBrick

MeltygalXZ

Thank you to our wonderful friends for playtesting.

Audio from freesounds.org by creators: 

redafs, ShortRecord, balolo, timgormly, IESP
